This is an (incomplete) listing of data science events in the
greater DC area that might involve R, including events in the NIH community. 

For a more comprehensive calendar of data science related events, you can bookmark the [Data Community DC Calendar](http://www.datacommunitydc.org/calendar/)

```{r, message=F, warning=F, echo = F}
library(tidyverse)
d <- tribble(
  ~dts, ~Event, ~Location,~Link,
  '2018-10-17','R-Ladies DC: Lecture on Interactive Data Visualization in R', 'GWU Gelman Library','https://www.meetup.com/rladies-dc/events/255309143/',
  '2018-11-08','DC R conference','Ronald Reagan Building','http://dc.rstats.ai',
  '2018-12-08','SatRday R Community Meeting', 'GWU Jack Morton Auditorium', 'https://dc2018.satrdays.org/'
)
d <- d %>% mutate(dts = format(as.Date(dts), '%b %e, %Y')) %>% 
  rename(Date = dts)
knitr::kable(d)
```


> Dr. Dasgupta is a speaker at the [DC R Conference](http://dc.rstats.ai){target="_blank"}, along with many brighter stars of the R universe.
